# Privacy Policy Draft (Черновик политики конфиденциальности)

## ⚠️ Legal Disclaimer

**Этот документ НЕ является юридическим документом и НЕ заменяет консультации юриста.**

Это образовательный шаблон для понимания структуры Privacy Policy. Перед публикацией вашей политики ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНО проконсультируйтесь с юристом, специализирующимся на:
- **GDPR** (если есть пользователи из EU)
- **CCPA/CPRA** (если есть пользователи из California)
- **Другие локальные законы** о защите данных

---

## Зачем нужна Privacy Policy?

**Юридическое требование**:
- GDPR (EU) — обязательна
- CCPA (California) — обязательна для определенных компаний
- Google / Apple App Store — требуют для публикации приложений
- Платёжные системы (Stripe, PayPal) — могут требовать

**Что она делает**:
- Объясняет, какие данные собираете
- Как используете данные
- С кем делитесь
- Права пользователей (удаление, экспорт, и т.д.)

---

#### Scope

This Privacy Policy applies to:
- Our website ([URL])
- Our mobile applications (if applicable)
- Our APIs and integrations (if applicable)
- Communications with us (email, support tickets)

**Out of scope**:
- Third-party websites linked from our Service (they have their own policies)
- Data processing by our customers using our platform (see "Data Controller vs Processor" section below)

### 3. How We Use Your Information (Как используем данные)

We use collected information for:

**To Provide the Service**:
- Create and manage your account
- Process transactions
- Deliver features you requested
- Provide customer support

**To Improve the Service**:
- Analyze usage patterns
- Debug errors
- Develop new features
- A/B testing

**To Communicate**:
- Send transactional emails (password resets, receipts)
- Product updates and announcements (can opt out)
- Marketing emails (ONLY with your consent — can opt out)

**To Ensure Security**:
- Detect and prevent fraud
- Monitor for abuse or violations of Terms of Service
- Comply with legal obligations

**Legal Basis** (for GDPR compliance):
- **Contract performance**: Processing necessary to provide the Service
- **Legitimate interests**: Analytics, security, fraud prevention
- **Consent**: Marketing emails, non-essential cookies
- **Legal obligation**: Tax records, responding to court orders

---

### 4. How We Share Your Information (С кем делимся)

**We DO NOT sell your personal data.**

We may share data with:

#### 4.1 Service Providers (Subprocessors)

Third-party vendors who help us operate the Service:

| Provider | Purpose | Data Shared | Location |
|----------|---------|-------------|----------|
| [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: AWS / GCP] | Cloud hosting | All data stored | [US / EU] |
| Stripe | Payment processing | Billing info | US |
| SendGrid / Postmark | Email delivery | Email, name | US |
| Google Analytics | Usage analytics | IP (anonymized), usage data | US |
| [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: другие] | [Назначение] | [Данные] | [Локация] |

**Data Processing Agreements (DPA)**: We have DPAs with all critical subprocessors (required for GDPR).

---

#### 4.2 Legal Requirements

We may disclose information if required by law:
- Court orders
- Subpoenas
- Regulatory requests
- To prevent harm or protect rights

---

#### 4.3 Business Transfers

If we are acquired or merged:
- Your data may be transferred to the acquirer
- You will be notified via email
- Privacy Policy will continue to apply (or you will be notified of changes)

---

### 5. Data Retention (Как долго храним)

**Active accounts**: While your account exists + [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: X days/months] after deletion request.

**Backups**: Data may remain in backups for up to [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: 90 days] after deletion.

**Legal requirements**: Some data (invoices, tax records) must be retained for [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: e.g., 7 years] per law.

**Anonymized data**: We may retain anonymized analytics indefinitely.

---

### 6. Your Rights (Права пользователей)

#### For All Users:

**Access**: Request a copy of your data.  
**Correction**: Update incorrect information.  
**Deletion**: Request account and data deletion ("Right to be Forgotten").  
**Portability**: Export your data in machine-readable format (JSON/CSV).  
**Opt-out**: Unsubscribe from marketing emails.

**How to exercise rights**: Email [privacy@yourcompany.com] or use in-app settings.

---

#### Additional Rights (GDPR — EU Users)

**Restrict processing**: Limit how we use your data (e.g., storage only).  
**Object**: Object to processing based on legitimate interests.  
**Withdraw consent**: For processing based on consent (marketing emails).

**Response time**: We will respond within 30 days.

**Right to complain**: You can lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority (DPA).

---

#### Additional Rights (CCPA — California Users)

**Know**: What personal information we collect.  
**Delete**: Request deletion (with exceptions for legal obligations).  
**Opt-out of sale**: We DO NOT sell data, so this is N/A.  
**Non-discrimination**: We will NOT discriminate against you for exercising rights.

**Verification**: We may ask for identity verification before fulfilling requests.

---

### 7. Data Security (Безопасность)

**We implement industry-standard security measures**:

**Technical safeguards**:
- Encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
- Encryption at rest (database encryption)
- Secure password hashing (bcrypt/argon2)
- Regular security audits

**Organizational safeguards**:
- Access controls (least privilege)
- Employee training on data protection
- Incident response plan

**⚠️ No system is 100% secure**: While we take reasonable precautions, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

**In case of breach**: We will notify affected users within 72 hours (GDPR requirement).

---

### 8. International Data Transfers (Международные передачи)

**Our servers are located in**: [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: US / EU / Multi-region]

**If you are in the EU/UK**:
- Your data may be transferred to the US
- We use **Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs)** approved by the EU Commission
- Or we rely on **adequacy decisions** (e.g., EU-US Data Privacy Framework, if certified)

**If you are in other regions**: [ЗАПОЛНИТЬ: описание для других юрисдикций]

---

### 9. Children's Privacy (Дети)

**Our Service is NOT intended for children under 16** (or 13 in the US).

We do not knowingly collect data from children. If you believe a child has provided us data, contact us immediately at [privacy@yourcompany.com], and we will delete it.

---

### 10. Cookies and Tracking (Куки и отслеживание)

**Types of cookies we use**:

| Type | Purpose | Can Opt Out? |
|------|---------|--------------|
| Essential | Authentication, session management | No (required for Service) |
| Analytics | Google Analytics, usage tracking | Yes (via browser settings or cookie banner) |
| Marketing | Remarketing (Facebook Pixel, Google Ads) | Yes |

**How to opt out**:
- Browser settings: Most browsers allow blocking cookies
- Cookie banner: Click "Manage preferences" on our website
- Opt-out tools: [NAI Opt-Out](http://optout.networkadvertising.org/), [DAA Opt-Out](http://optout.aboutads.info/)

**Do Not Track (DNT)**: We currently do not respond to DNT signals (industry standard not yet established).

---

### 11. Data Controller vs Data Processor

**When we are the Data Controller**:
- Your account data
- Analytics on how you use the Service
- Marketing communications

**When we are the Data Processor** (if applicable):
- Customer data that you store/process using our platform
- You (the customer) are the Data Controller
- We process according to your instructions and our DPA

**Your responsibilities as Controller** (if using our platform to process others' data):
- You must have a legal basis to collect data
- You must have your own Privacy Policy for your end users
- You are responsible for data subject requests from your users

---

### 12. Third-Party Links (Сторонние ссылки)

Our Service may contain links to third-party websites/services.

**We are NOT responsible** for their privacy practices. Please read their Privacy Policies.

---

### 13. Changes to This Privacy Policy (Изменения политики)

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.

**How we notify you**:
- Email notification (for material changes)
- Notice on our website
- In-app notification

**Your options**:
- Continue using the Service = acceptance of new policy
- If you disagree, you may delete your account

**Change log**: See bottom of this page for version history.

## Appendix: Definitions (Глоссарий)

- **Personal Data**: Any information relating to an identified or identifiable person.
- **Processing**: Any operation performed on data (collection, storage, use, disclosure, deletion).
- **Data Controller**: The entity that determines purposes and means of processing.
- **Data Processor**: The entity that processes data on behalf of the Controller.
- **Consent**: Freely given, specific, informed agreement to processing.
- **DPA (Data Processing Agreement)**: Contract between Controller and Processor.
- **GDPR**: General Data Protection Regulation (EU law).
- **CCPA**: California Consumer Privacy Act (California law).

## Implementation Checklist (Чек-лист внедрения)

Перед публикацией Privacy Policy:

- [ ] Проконсультироваться с юристом (обязательно!)
- [ ] Добавить email privacy@[ваш-домен]
- [ ] Настроить процесс обработки data subject requests (GDPR/CCPA)
- [ ] Подписать DPAs со всеми subprocessors
- [ ] Внедрить cookie banner на сайт (если используете non-essential cookies)
- [ ] Добавить ссылку на Privacy Policy в:
  - [ ] Footer сайта
  - [ ] Signup форму ("I agree to Privacy Policy")
  - [ ] App Store / Google Play (если мобильное приложение)
- [ ] Настроить процесс уведомления о breach (72 часа для GDPR)
- [ ] Хранить логи изменений Privacy Policy
